svg.title: Phase diagram of water (simplified)
svg.desc: Phase diagram of water as a log-lin chart with pressure from 1 Pa to 1 TPa and temperature from 0 K to 650 K, compiled from data in http://www.lsbu.ac.uk/water/phase.html and http://ergodic.ugr.es/termo/lecciones/water1.html by CMG Lee. Note that the phases of Ice X and XI (hexagonal) differ from the diagram in https://chem331001fall09.pbworks.com/w/page/15647320/LECTURE-10 . This is a simplified version the diagram.
